alert.note: Alert for Gallatin; Meagher (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 24 at 10:26PM MDT until August 24 at 11:30PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: The National Weather Service in Great Falls has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Meagher County in central Montana... Northeastern Gallatin County in south central Montana... * Until 1130 PM MDT. * At 1025 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 13 miles northeast of Belgrade, or 15 miles north of Bozeman, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Meagher and northeastern Gallatin Counties. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding, especially over the Bridger Foothills burn scar of 2020. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
